mapper.select: select u.* from sy_units u inner JOIN sy_emp e on u.ID = e.EmpUnit group by u.ID having u.ID = #{ID}
select u.ID,u.`Name`,u.Remarks,e.EmpName,u.OperationTime from sy_units u,sy_emp e where u.OperatorID=e.ID
select u.ID,u.`Name`,u.Remarks,e.EmpName,u.OperationTime from sy_units u,sy_emp e where u.OperatorID=e.ID and `Name`=#{name}
